verbs.description: [ARG0: President Donald Trump] [V: repaid] [ARG1: personal attorney Michael Cohen] [ARG3: for an October 2016 payment to adult film star Stormy Daniels as part of a nondisclosure agreement] , Trump lawyer Rudy Giuliani told Fox ...
